feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Serial Number Profile : Prefix (CBC activity 103636)
entry.content:
Hello,

I am trying to set up Serial number prefix for my customer.

I have read this blog which explains how to kind of manage serial numbers number range but this model can only work if we want to have the same number ranges for ALL materials in all divisions because the reange number is related to the equipment category. Also it will only accept digits, no alphanumerical characters, special character etc...

Instead, I thought about using the Prefix field in the CBC activity 103636 which really seems dedicated to that usage:

But whether it is numerical or alphanumerical characters, the prefix won't show on the material serial numbers automatically created.

Note : this is to work with WM.

Any idea what I am doing wrong to make it work?

Many thanks,

Adrien

entry.title: VOFM – Custom Routine for Packaging Instruction Determination in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, during packaging instruction determination for production receipts with synchronous posting, the system automatically determines the main packaging instruction. However, the alternative packaging instructions are not displayed.

In my case, the selection of an alternative instruction is based on the Production Version, but this field is not available in the field catalog for condition-based determination. In the configuration step Define Schema for Packaging Instruction Determination, there is a “Condition” field. In on-premise systems, this would be implemented using a condition formula created in transaction VOFM.

I have seen SAP Notes related to VOFM enablement in Cloud for sales pricing determination (for example, Note 2885513). I also checked the documentation here:
https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/32da8359c8ee4e8b8e8c5e15cacba5aa/e78cbf53f106b44ce10000000a174cb4.html?locale=en-US
but found nothing regarding packaging instruction determination.

My question is:
Is it possible to develop custom condition formulas for packaging instruction determination in SAP Public Cloud?
If yes, what is the correct approach?

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Configuration ID 102742 missing in S4C 2508?
entry.content:
Hello SAP experts!

My customer wants to group their vendors by number, which is nothing new in S4C. I have always done this as follows:

1. Define Number Ranges (102296)

2. Define Groupings and Assign Number Ranges (102241)

 

When creating a business partner, I now get the message:

“Grouping ZK01 has not been assigned to a supplier account group.”

I also know the solution. There was always the configuration:

3. Define Number Assignment for Direction BP to Vendor (102742)

But that's no longer in CBC?!?!? What happened? And how do I configure my groupings and number ranges now?

Thanks in advance for any advice and best regards,

Rado

entry.title: Preventing Negative Balances in Cost Centers in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear community,

I’m working in SAP Public Cloud environments and, while configuring and reviewing cost centers, I’ve noticed that they can end up showing a negative balance.

Based on the operational setup we’re implementing, this shouldn’t happen. My question is:

Is there any way in the system to trigger an error, a warning, or some kind of alert when a cost center is about to go negative?

I’d appreciate any guidance, experience, or configuration tips that could help control this behavior.

Thank you in advance!

entry.title: S/4HANA Public Cloud – Error when creating billing document with future billing date from preliminar
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I’m working in Sales in S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, using the Manage Preliminary Billing Documents app.

For a preliminary billing document (type F2) with billing date 29.11.2025 and status Finalized, when I select it and choose Create Billing Documents, if I enter a future billing date (for example 01.12.2025) the system raises the error:

Document cannot be posted for the date 20251201, date should be less than 20251128.

My question is: which configuration or restriction is controlling this check, and how can we allow a future billing date in this scenario?

In other customers’ tenants we can create billing documents with future billing dates using the same process, but in this customer’s tenant this error appears. I have already reviewed the relevant configuration for billing / posting dates but I still don’t see what is blocking it or how to unlock it.

Screenshots of the process are attached.
Thanks in advance for any hints or SAP Notes!

SD (Sales and Distribution) SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Sales SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

entry.title: ABAP Runtime error when adding WBS element to the Sales Order
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

I’m working in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and I’m trying to create a sales order using the standard “Manage Sales Orders” app.

The error only happens when I add a WBS Element to the sales order item. As soon as I enter the WBS element and press Enter or try to save, I get the following error popup:

  • ABAP Runtime error 'MESSAGE_TYPE_X'

  • Unspecified provider error occurred. See Error Context and Call Stack.

  • Resource not found for entity 'C_SALESORDERMANAGE'

( Screenshot attached)

Has anyone seen this issue before in Public Cloud?
Is this related to a missing configuration, a restriction in the public cloud scope, or possibly a backend issue requiring SAP support? What should I check in the system?

Any guidance or hints on where to check would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: In public cloud how to get Sales Order Header Text
entry.content:
How can we read Sales Order Header Text in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (clean core, no modification)?

I have tried multiple ways but couldn’t get the header text of a Sales Order.
In Public Cloud:

  • Read_Text is not allowed

  • Table access to STXH/STXL is not allowed

  • CDS view extensibility for reading text via text-object/text-id is not available

  • BAdI access to SD text API is restricted

entry.title: S/4HANA Public Cloud – Error when creating billing document with future billing date from preliminar
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I’m working in Sales in S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, using the Manage Preliminary Billing Documents app.

For a preliminary billing document (type F2) with billing date 29.11.2025 and status Finalized, when I select it and choose Create Billing Documents, if I enter a future billing date (for example 01.12.2025) the system raises the error:

Document cannot be posted for the date 20251201, date should be less than 20251128.

My question is: which configuration or restriction is controlling this check, and how can we allow a future billing date in this scenario?

In other customers’ tenants we can create billing documents with future billing dates using the same process, but in this customer’s tenant this error appears. I have already reviewed the relevant configuration for billing / posting dates but I still don’t see what is blocking it or how to unlock it.

Screenshots of the process are attached.
Thanks in advance for any hints or SAP Notes!

SD (Sales and Distribution)   SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Sales   SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

entry.title: S/4HANA cloud public data migration practice test
entry.content:
Hello,

1. I am having issues with s/4hana cloud public practice test, exercise 9, data migration. I successfully downloaded and populated the .xml file with the data provided in the guided pdf doc and saved as .xml but I cant seem to validate, it keeps saying validation failed with error "

The format of the uploaded file Source data for Bank_092.xml is wrong. The file contains only one line" I am sure my file has 3 lines as instructed in the pdf file. I have deleted and redownloaded several times. I have been on this for over 3 days now. Can someone help me? As I need to schedule my exam but I cant do that without completing the practice test. I have attached images of my .xml file and error messages and text of error messages. I cant proceed to exercise 10 without completing exercise 9.

ERROR:

Long Description

Short Text

The format of the uploaded file Source data for Bank_092.xml is wrong

Diagnosis

The format of the uploaded file Source data for Bank_092.xml is wrong. The file contains only one line.

Procedure

Check the file and correct the format.

 

 

2. I cant seem to start exercise 11 too "Copy and Edit a Standard Test Automate Process". I cant find the "Manage Your Test Processes App" as well under my practice test. Is exercise 9 a prerequisite for exercises 11 to 13 or why cant I find Manage Your Test Processes App? 

Please I need help as I have tried all means. Exercises 9 to 13 I am stucked! I cant schedule my exams without completing the practice test!

I am tired and frustrated its over 3 days now!!!

entry.title: SAP Cloud ERP - Scope Item duplicated in more than 1 line of business/ Business area
entry.content:
Hi Team,

In SAP Cloud ERP (Public Cloud), certain scope items are duplicated across Line of Business/Business Area.

Please find below an example of scope item 7DW Lot Size of One based on Make to Order, which is appearing 13 times across Line of Business/Business Area as below. There are about 129 Scope items which are duplicated in 2508_DE list. This results in redundancy of scope items as part of Project scoping as well as delivery.

Can someone from SAP help to address this issue? In case if its not possible to remove duplicacy, can SAP mark LOB/Business Area with some identification (like *), so unique scope items can be identified.

Additional example of scope item 54V Produce and Sell Standard Products – Warehouse Managed which is appearing in 11 Line of Business/Business Area.

 Additional example of scope item 33Q Actual Costing which is appearing in Business Area Cost Management and Profitability Analysis which is correct, while it is also appearing in Business Area Accounting and Financial Close, which seems to be incorrect.

 Regards

Sandeep

entry.title: CDS View in SAP Public Cloud for Settlement Rule in WBS/Project
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Is there any standard CDS view available in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud that can help us view the Settlement Rule maintained in WBS Element/Project?

Requirement:
We need a logic to check the WBS element’s settlement rule to verify if an Asset Under Construction (AUC) is already created before proceeding further.

Has anyone implemented this or knows which CDS views or APIs can be leveraged for this scenario? Any suggestions or best practices would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,

Gunadharshini

entry.title: SOAP 创建固定资产 API失败消息面板HTTP Code: 403 ( Forbidden )
entry.content:
SOAP 创建固定资产 API失败消息面板HTTP Code: 403 ( Forbidden )

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:fi="http://sap.com/xi/FI-AA">
    <soapenv:Header xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">
        <wsa:Action>http://sap.com/xi/FI-AA/FixedAssetCreateMainBulkRequest_In/FixedAssetCreateMainBulkRequest_InRequest</wsa:Action>
        <wsa:MessageID>uuid:12345678-90AB-CDEF-0123-202407010001</wsa:MessageID>
    </soapenv:Header>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <fi:FixedAssetCreateMainBulkRequestMessage>
            <MessageHeader>
                <ID></ID>
                <Creat

entry.title: CDS VIEW About Credit Exposure
entry.content:
在公有云环境中，是否有某个公开的 CDS View 可以获取到所有信用敞口类别（100/200/300/400/500）对应的信用敞口金额？


目前我们只找到了 I_CreditExposureItem，但它仅能获取到100（未清订单）和400（交货敞口）类别的金额，缺少200（应收账款未清项）、300（特殊敞口）等类别。


另外也查看了 CDS View：I_CreditLimitUtilization，其中虽有信用敞口相关字段，但也存在同样的问题——其汇总金额仅包含100和400类别，并非全部敞口类别的总额。

 

这与前台应用（如“显示信用敞口”和“管理信用账户”）中显示的信用敞口金额不一致，可能导致信用风险监控不准确或决策依据不完整。
